00013 class ImageFormat_raw: public FileFormat
00014 {
00015     typedef std::map<std::string, unsigned short> typemap;
00016 protected:
00017     std::string suffixes()const {
00018         return std::string( "raw" );
00019     }
00020     struct Deleter {
00021         //members
00022         int m_file;
00023         std::string m_filename;
00024         Deleter( int file, const std::string &filename ): m_file( file ), m_filename( filename ) {}
00025 
00026         void operator ()( void *at ) {
00027             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Freeing memory at " << at << " mapped from " << m_filename;
00028             munmap( at, boost::filesystem::file_size( m_filename ) ); //@todo will fail when the file was replaced in the meantime
00029             close( m_file );
00030         }
00031     };
00032 
00033     class RawMemChunk: public data::Chunk
00034     {
00035     public:
00036         template<typename T> RawMemChunk( T *src, const Deleter &del, size_t width, size_t height, size_t slices = 1, size_t timesteps = 1 )
00037             : data::Chunk( src, del, width, height, slices, timesteps ) {}
00038     };
00039 public:
00040     std::string getName()const {
00041         return "raw data output";
00042     }
00043     virtual std::string dialects( const std::string & ) const {
00044         std::string ret;
00045         typemap types = util::getTransposedTypeMap( false, true );
00046         types.erase( "boolean*" );
00047         types.erase( "date*" );
00048         types.erase( "timestamp*" );
00049         types.erase( "selection*" );
00050         BOOST_FOREACH( typemap::const_reference pair, types ) {
00051             ret += pair.first.substr( 0, pair.first.length() - 1 );
00052             ret += " ";
00053         }
00054         return ret;
00055     }
00056 
00057 
00058     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00059 
00060 
00061         const size_t fsize = boost::filesystem::file_size( filename );
00062         const unsigned short type = util::getTransposedTypeMap( false, true )[dialect+"*"];
00063 
00064         if( type == 0 ) {
00065             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "No known datatype given, you have to give the type ofe the raw data as rdialect (eg. \"-rdialect u16bit\")";
00066             throwGenericError( "No known datatype" );
00067         }
00068 
00069         const size_t elemSize = data::_internal::ValuePtrBase::createById( type, 0 )->bytesPerElem();
00070 
00071         const size_t ssize = sqrt( fsize / elemSize );
00072 
00073         if( ssize *ssize *elemSize == fsize ) {
00074             LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Guessing size of read and phase to be " << ssize;
00075 
00076             int mfile = open( filename.c_str(), O_RDONLY );
00077 
00078             if( mfile == -1 ) {
00079                 throwSystemError( errno, std::string( "Failed to open " ) + filename );
00080             }
00081 
00082 
00083             char *mmem = ( char * )mmap( NULL, fsize, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, mfile, 0 ); //map it into memory
00084 
00085             if( mmem == MAP_FAILED ) {
00086                 throwSystemError( errno, std::string( "Failed to map " ) + filename + " into memory" );
00087             }
00088 
00089 
00090             Deleter del( mfile, filename );
00091             chunks.push_back( RawMemChunk( ( uint16_t * )mmem, del, ssize, ssize ) );
00092             data::Chunk &ch = chunks.back();
00093             ch.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", 0 );
00094             ch.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", 0 );
00095             ch.setPropertyAs( "voxelSize", util::fvector4( 1, 1, 1 ) );
00096             ch.setPropertyAs( "rowVec", util::fvector4( 1, 0 ) );
00097             ch.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4( 0, 1 ) );
00098             ch.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", util::fvector4( 0, 0 ) );
00099             return 1;
00100         } else {
00101             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Could not guess image size for " << fsize << " bytes of data";
00102             return 0;
00103         }
00104     }
00105 
00106     void write( const data::Image &image, const std::string &filename, const std::string &/*dialect*/ )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00107         class WriteOp: public data::ChunkOp
00108         {
00109             std::ofstream out;
00110             unsigned short typeID;
00111         public:
00112             WriteOp( std::string fname, unsigned short id ): out( fname.c_str() ), typeID( id ) {
00113                 out.exceptions( std::ios::failbit | std::ios::badbit );
00114             }
00115             bool operator()( data::Chunk &ref, util::FixedVector<size_t, 4 > /*posInImage*/ ) {
00116                 const boost::shared_ptr<void> data( ref.getValuePtrBase().getRawAddress() );
00117                 const size_t data_size = ref.bytesPerVoxel() * ref.getVolume();
00118                 out.write( static_cast<const char *>( data.get() ), data_size );
00119                 return true;
00120             }
00121         };
00122         const std::pair<std::string, std::string> splitted = makeBasename( filename );
00123         unsigned short type = image.getMajorTypeID();
00124 
00125         std::string typeStr = util::getTypeMap( false )[type];
00126         typeStr.erase( typeStr.find_last_not_of( '*' ) + 1 );
00127 
00128         const std::string outName = splitted.first + "_" + image.getSizeAsString() + "_" + typeStr + splitted.second ;
00129 
00130         LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "Writing image of size " << image.getSizeAsVector() << " and type " << typeStr << " to " << outName;
00131         WriteOp writer( outName, type );
00132         const_cast<data::Image &>( image ).foreachChunk( writer );
00133     }
00134     bool tainted()const {return false;}//internal plugins are not tainted
00135 };
00136 }
